title: 820-00281 change screen now camera not working
message: i tryed 2 screens and the camera does not work

title: 820-00281 change screen now camera not working
message: i put a 2019 screen on a 2016 the screen works but THE camera does not is there anything i can do

title: 820-00281 change screen now camera not working
message: The screens are not compatible...you need to use an A1707 screen with A1707 boards/units; only use A1990 screen with A1990 boards/units. Probably blew the camera filter near the LCD connector.

title: 820-00281 change screen now camera not working
message: when i put the old screen back the camera works thank you ill find the write one
